definitions.definition: An arthropod (in the Insecta class) characterized by six legs , up to four wings , and a chitinous exoskeleton .
examples: Our shed has several insect infestions, including ants, yellowjackets, and wasps.

definitions.definition: Any small arthropod similar to an insect, including spiders , centipedes , millipedes , etc.
examples: The swamp is swarming with every sort of insect .
The manager’s assistant was the worst sort of insect .

main_definition: An arthropod (in the Insecta class) characterized by six legs , up to four wings , and a chitinous exoskeleton .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial ) Any small arthropod similar to an insect, including spiders , centipedes , millipedes , etc.
( derogatory ) A contemptible or powerless person.
